title: [CY] Your probate application
block1Heading2: [CY] Post your documents to the Probate Registry
block1Text3: [CY] Print this coversheet and include it with your documents.
block1Text4: [CY] If you do not have a printer, write your reference number {ccdReferenceNumber} on a sheet of paper and send it with your documents.
block1Text5: [CY] If the will or codicils have changed in any way since you’ve had them, you’ll need to include a letter explaining what’s changed and why.
block1Text6: [CY] The grant of probate won’t be issued if you don’t have all the necessary documents.
block1Text7: [CY] Send your documents using a signed-for postal service to:
block1Text8:
[CY] Digital Application
Oxford District Probate Registry
Combined Court Building
St Aldates
Oxford
OX1 1LY
block1Checklist-item1-will-no-codicils: [CY] the original will (this won’t be returned to you)
block1Checklist-item1-will-codicils: [CY] the original will and any updates (codicils) (these won’t be returned to you)
block1Checklist-item2-spouse-renouncing: [CY] a renunciation form filled in by the spouse or civil partner of the deceased who is permanently giving up the right to make this application for probate
block1Checklist-item3-will-not-uploaded: [CY] the original death certificate (this will be returned to you)
block1Checklist-item4-iht205: [CY] the completed inheritance tax form IHT 205
block1Checklist-item5-spouse-renunciated: [CY] a renunciation form filled in by any executors who are permanently giving up their right to make this application for probate
block1Checklist-item6-deed-poll: [CY] copy of the deed poll document for {executorCurrentName}
block2Text1: [CY] You have posted the documents needed for your probate application.
block2Text2: [CY] You will receive another update when the Probate Registry has received your documents.
block2Text3: [CY] You do not need to do anything.
block3Text1: [CY] Your documents were received by the Probate Registry on [__DATE_HERE__]
block3Text2: [CY] Your probate application will be processed and you will receive your ‘grant of probate’ in the post. This currently takes about 8 weeks.
block3Text3: [CY] You will be contacted if there are any issues with your probate application.
sentDocuments: [CY] I have sent my documents to the Probate Registry

required.summary: [CY] You haven’t ticked the check box to let us know that you’ve sent your documents
required.message: [CY] Tick the check box to let us know that you’ve sent your documents
